Xiao-Ming Wu (伍晓鸣)

B.E. Student, MIMA laboratory

Email: wuxiaoming.alg@gmail.com


Biography

I am currently an undergraduate student at Shandong University and I am pursuing a master's degree.

During my undergraduate study, I worked as a research assistant in the MIMA laboratory in Shandong University, following assistant professor Xin Luo. During this period, I mainly work on hashing retrieval.

Research Interest

  • Machine Learning
  • Computer Vision
  • Information Retrieval

Publication

  • Discrete Online Cross-Modal Hashing. [PDF]
    Yu-Wei Zhan, Yong-Xin Wang, Yu Sun, Xiao-Ming Wu, Xin Luo*, and Xin-Shun Xu.
    In: Pattern Recognition(PR), 108262, 2021
